About - Image

Use to display the About component with images.

Our Story

Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident.

Markup: blog/blog.twig 
<!--BLOG AREA-->
<section class="blog-area section-padding">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h2>{{ heading }}</h2>
          <h3>{{ sub_heading }}</h3>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      {% for item in items -%}
        <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
          <div class="single-post text-center">
            <div class="blog-post-img">
              {% include '@d8training/image/image.twig' with item.image only %}
            </div>
            <div class="post-details">
              <a href="{{ item.section.url }}" class="post-meta-button">{{ item.section.title }}</a>
              <h3><a href="{{ item.url }}">{{ item.title }}</a></h3>
              <p class="post-meta"><a href="{{ item.url }}">{{ item.date }}</a> - <a href="{{ item.url }}">{{ item.comments }}</a></p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      {%- endfor %}
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
<!--BLOG AREA END-->

Markup: counter/counter.twig 
<!--COUNTER AREA-->
<div class="counter-area section-padding">
  <div class="count-area-bg" style="background-image: url({{ background_image.src }})"></div>
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      {% for item in items -%}
        <div class="col-md-3 col-lg-3 col-sm-6 col-xs-12">
          <div class="single-counter text-center">
            <div class="counter-icon"><i class="{{ item.icon_class }}"></i></div>
            <h3 class="counter">{{ item.count }}</h3>
            <p>{{ item.title }}</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      {%- endfor %}
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
<!--COUNTER AREA END-->

Markup: events/events.twig 
<!--EVENT AREA-->
<section class="event-area section-padding">
  <div class="event-area-bg" style="background-image: url({{ background_image.src }});"></div>
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h2>{{ heading }}</h2>
          <h3>{{ sub_heading }}</h3>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row event-list">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        {% for item in items %}
        <div class="single-event">
          <div class="event-img">
            {% include '@d8training/image/image.twig' with item.image only %}
          </div>
          <div class="event-content">
            <div class="event-date">
              <p>{{ item.short_date|raw }}</p>
            </div>
            <div class="event-details">
              <h3><a href="{{ item.url }}">{{ item.title }}</a></h3>
              <p class="event-meta"><a href="{{ item.url }}">{{ item.long_date }}</a> - {{ item.venue }}</p>
              <p>{{ item.description|raw }}</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
<!--EVENT AREA END-->
Source: events/events.scss, line 1

Markup: footer/footer.twig 
<!--FOOER AREA-->
<div class="footer-area">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="footer-top section-padding text-center">
          <div class="footer-logo">
            {% include '@d8training/image/image.twig' with image only %}
          </div>
          <div class="footer-address">
            <p>{{ address }}</p>
            <p><a href="mailto:{{ email }}">{{ email }}</a></p>
            <p><a href="tel:{{ telephone }}">{{ telephone }}</a></p>
          </div>
          <div class="footer-social-bookmark">
            <ul>
              {% for bookmark in bookmarks %}
              <li><a href="{{ bookmark.url }}"><i class="{{ bookmark.icon_class }}"></i></a></li>
              {% endfor %}
            </ul>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="footer-menu">
          <ul>
            {% for link in links %}
            <li><a href="{{ link.url }}">{{ link.text }}</a></li>
            {% endfor %}
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="footer-copyright">
          <p>{{ copyright|raw }}</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
<!--FOOER AREA END-->

Header

Use to display a Main Menu, Slider, or Barner components.

Markup: header/header.twig 
<!--START TOP AREA-->
<header class="top-area {{ classes|default() }}" id="home">
  {% if (barner|default()) -%}
    <div class="page-barner-bg" style="background-image: url({{ barner.background_image.src }})"></div>
  {%- endif %}

  {% if (main_menu|default()) -%}
    {% include '@d8training/main-menu/main-menu.twig' with main_menu only %}
  {%- endif %}

  {% if (slider|default()) %}
    {% include '@d8training/slider/slider.twig' with slider only %}
  {% endif %}

  {% if (barner|default()) %}
    {% include '@d8training/barner/barner.twig' with barner only %}
  {% endif %}
</header>
<!--END TOP AREA-->
Source: header/header.scss, line 1

Markup: barner/barner.twig 
<!--PAGE BARNER AREA-->
<div class="page-barner-area">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="barner-text">
          <h1>{{ heading }}</h1>
          <ul class="page-location">
            {% for breadcrumb in breadcrumbs -%}
              {% if 0 < loop.index0 -%}
                <li><i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i></li>
              {%- endif %}
              <li class="{{ breadcrumb.active ? 'active' }}"><a href="{{ breadcrumb.url }}">{{ breadcrumb.text }}</a></li>
            {%- endfor %}
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
<!--PAGE BARNER AREA END-->

Markup: main-menu/main-menu.twig 
<div class="header-top-area">
  <div class="top-bar">
    <div class="container">
      <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-7 col-lg-6 col-sm-8">
          <div class="call-to-action">
            <p><i class="fa fa-envelope-o"></i>Email: <a href="mailto:{{ email }}">{{ email }}</a></p>
            <p><i class="fa fa-phone"></i>Telephone: <a href="tel:{{ telephone }}">{{ telephone }}</a></p>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-5 col-lg-6 col-sm-4">
          <div class="book-table-popup">
            <a href="{{ cta.url }}">{{ cta.text }}</a>
          </div>
          <div class="top-social-bookmark">
            <ul>
              {% for link in bookmarks %}
              <li><a href="{{ link.url }}"><i class="{{ link.icon_class }}"></i></a></li>
              {% endfor %}
            </ul>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!--MAINMENU AREA-->
  <div class="mainmenu-area" id="mainmenu-area">
    <div class="mainmenu-area-bg"></div>
    <nav class="navbar">
      <div class="container">
        <div class="navbar-header">
          <button class="collapsed navbar-toggle" type="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target=".bs-example-js-navbar-scrollspy">
              <span class="sr-only">Toggle navigation</span>
              <span class="icon-bar"></span>
              <span class="icon-bar"></span>
              <span class="icon-bar"></span>
          </button>
          {% if primary_logo|default() -%}
            <a href="{{ home_url }}" class="navbar-brand white">{% include '@d8training/image/image.twig' with primary_logo only %}</a>
          {%- endif %}
          {% if secondary_logo|default() -%}
            <a href="{{ home_url }}" class="navbar-brand">{% include '@d8training/image/image.twig' with secondary_logo only %}</a>
          {%- endif %}
        </div>
        <div class="collapse navbar-collapse bs-example-js-navbar-scrollspy">
          {% if search_form|default() -%}
            {% include '@d8training/search-form/search-form.twig' with search_form only %}
          {%- endif %}
          <ul id="nav" class="nav navbar-nav cl-effect-11">
            {% for item in menu -%}
              <li class="{{ item.active ? 'active' }}">
                <a class="{{ item.sub_menu|default() ? 'at-drop-down' }}" href="{{ item.url }}">
                  {{ item.text }}
                  {% if item.sub_menu|default() -%}
                    <i class="hidden-md hidden-lg fa fa-angle-down"></i>
                  {%- endif %}
                </a>
                {% if item.sub_menu|default() -%}
                  <ul class="sub-menu">
                    {% for item2 in item.sub_menu -%}
                      <li class="{{ item2.active ? 'active' }}"><a href="{{ item2.url }}">{{ item2.text }}</a></li>
                    {%- endfor %}
                  </ul>
                {%- endif %}
              </li>
            {%- endfor %}
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>
    </nav>
  </div>
  <!--END MAINMENU AREA END-->
</div>
Source: main-menu/main-menu.scss, line 1

Markup: slider/slider.twig 
<!--HOME SLIDER AREA-->
<div class="slider-area">
  <div class="pogoSlider">
    {% for item in items %}
      <div class="pogoSlider-slide" data-transition="fade" data-duration="1500" style="background:url({{ item.image.src }}) no-repeat scroll 0 0 / cover;">
        <h2 class="pogoSlider-slide-element" data-in="expand" data-out="expand" data-duration="700">{{ item.pre_heading }}</h2>
        <h1 class="pogoSlider-slide-element" data-in="expand" data-out="expand" data-duration="1500">{{ item.heading|raw }}</h1>
        <h3 class="pogoSlider-slide-element" data-in="expand" data-out="expand" data-duration="2300"><a href="{{ item.cta.url }}">{{ item.cta.text }}</a></h3>
      </div>
    {% endfor %}
  </div>
</div>
<!--HOME SLIDER AREA END-->

    Markup: instagram/instagram.twig 
    <!--INSTAGRAM FEED-->
<section class="instagram-area section-padding">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h4>{{ heading }} <a href="https://instagram.com/{{ username|replace({ '@':'' }) }}">{{ username }}</a></h4>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="instagram-feed-content text-center">
          <ul class="instagram-feed" data-username="{{ username }}" data-size="{{ size }}" data-count="{{ count }}"></ul>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

    Markup: menus/menus.twig 
    <!--MENUS AREA-->
<section class="menus-area section-padding" id="menu">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h2>{{ heading }}</h2>
          <h3>{{ sub_heading }}</h3>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="food-menu-list-menu">
          <ul>
            <li class="filter active" data-filter="all">All</li>
            {% for tag in tags -%}
              <li class="filter" data-filter=".{{ tag.machine_name }}">{{ tag.title }}</li>
            {%- endfor %}
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row food-menu-list">
      {% for item in items -%}
        <div class="mix col-md-3 col-lg-3 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 {{ item.tags }}">
          <div class="food-menu-img">
            <a href="{{ item.image.src }}" class="menu-popup" data-effect="mfp-zoom-out">
              {% include '@d8training/image/image.twig' with item.image only %}
            </a>
          </div>
          <div class="food-menu-details">
            <h4>{{ item.title }}</h4>
            <p class="menu-price">{{ item.price }}</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      {%- endfor %}
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
<!--MENUS AREA END-->
    Source: menus/menus.scss, line 1

    Not Found

    Use to display a Not Found component.

    Opps!

    Page cannot be found! We'll have it figured out in no time.Meanwhile, check out these fresh ideas:

    Please try your search again or go to

    Homepage, About Us, or Contact

    Markup: not-found/not-found.twig 
    <!--NOT FOUND AREA-->
<section class="error-text-area section-padding">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 col-md-offset-3 col-lg-offset-3 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="error-text text-center">
          <div class="error-main-hidding">
            <h2>{{ heading }}</h2>
            <h5>{{ content }}</h5>
          </div>
          <div class="single-sidebar-widget">
            <form action="#">
              <input type="search" name="search" id="search" placeholder="Search...">
              <button type="submit"><i class="fa fa-search"></i></button>
            </form>
          </div>
          <p>{{ suggestion_message }}</p>
          <p>
            {% for link in suggestion_links -%}
              {{ not loop.first ? (', ' ~ (loop.last ? 'or')) }}
              <a href="{{ link.url }}">{{ link.text }}</a>
            {%- endfor %}
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
<!--NOT FOUND AREA END-->
    Source: not-found/not-found.scss, line 1

    Markup: promotions/promotions.twig

<section class="promotions-area section-padding">
    <div class="promotion-area-bg" style="background-image: url({{ background_image.src }})"></div>
    <div class="container wow fadeIn">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
                <div class="area-title text-center">
                    <h2>{{ heading }}</h2>
                    <h3>{{ sub_heading }}</h3>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row">
            {% for item in items %}
            <div class="col-md-4 col-lg-4 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
                <div class="single-promotions text-center">
                    <div class="promotions-img">
                        {% include '@d8training/image/image.twig' with item.image only %}
                        <div class="pakage-rate">
                            <p>{{ item.price|raw }}</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="promotions-details">
                        <h4>{{ item.title }}</h4>
                        <a href="{{ item.cta.url }}" class="read-more">{{ item.cta.text }}</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
    </div>
</section>
